net.enilink.komma.model.change

Class ChangeRecorder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.enilink.komma.model.change.ChangeRecorder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataChangeListener

    public class ChangeRecorder
extends Object
implements IDataChangeListener
    A change recorder for the tree contents of a collection of EObjects. It monitors the specified objects and then produces a change model representing the changes needed to reverse (undo) all the model changes made while recording.

      • createChangeDescription

        protected ChangeDescription createChangeDescription()

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Disposes this change recorder. This method ends a recording without consolidating the changes.

      • endRecording

        public IChangeDescription endRecording()
        Ends the recording and consolidates the changes on the change description.
        Returns:
        the IChangeDescription or null if there is nothing being recorded.

        protected IChangeDescription getChangeDescription()

      • isRecording

        public boolean isRecording()
        Returns:
        true if this change recorder is recording or false otherwise.

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Temporarily pauses the recording of the current change description.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if I am not currently recording
        See Also:
        isRecording(), isPaused(), resume()
